randomise_parameters module¶

class randomise_parameters.RandomiseParameters(path, filename_in)¶

It reads a copasi file configured for parameter estimation task, and randomise the starting values of the parameters to estimate. Then, it saves the new file. As input, it receives the number of files to generate (multiple calibrations)

generate_instances_from_template(num_files, idstr)¶

Generate num_files files, in which the parameters to estimate have a random starting value chosen in the determined ammissible range for that parameter.

Parameters:
  • num_files –
  • idstr –
Returns:
